text: Ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru di li, chengwei quanyuan; ranhou, jie ta shengchu gezhong zhuangjia, ranhou hemiao diaoling, ni kan ta biancheng huang de, ranhou ta shi ta biancheng suipian. Zai nalimian, duiyu you lizhi zhe, dique you yizhong jiaohui.
